column4: uhm, i had ubuntu and windows, and using grub. i deleted the ubuntu partition and formated it to NTFS so grubs dir exists no more, is there a way to boot to windows now?
alastor666, boot from the windows xp cd
alastor666, system restore mode or something
ok.. booting from the CD now!
ok i did that, it said it was installed, i rebooted, and it said, OPENING GRUB [the message] and ERROR..
i had to do a fixmbr, not fixboot i think [im rebootin now]
yeah, fixmbr, did the work, since grub was written to mbr. anyways thanks :D
